availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bracken County, Kentucky, soldier. Married to Cornelia S. Wiley on December 27, 1865. Served in the 16th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as 1st Sergeant from January 28, 1862; 2nd Lieutenant from June 8, 1862; and 1st Lieutenant from February 19, 1863. Assistant Inspector General. Captain in the 16th Kentucky Voluntary Veteran Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) from May 13, 1865, to July 15, 1865. Clerk in Bracken County in December 1865.

ab.bibl:
Kentucky, County Marriage Records, 1783-1965, Film #000344095, Bracken County, December 27, 1865 (accessed via Ancestry.com).
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 930-31.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1867), 618, 955.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers Who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 297.
